promptResponse.title: Prompt Response
promptResponse.description:
The formatted fallback message that provides guidance, alternative options, and the official ABC NC website link when no information is found in either knowledge base.

**Message Includes:**
- Acknowledgment of the user's query
- Apology for not finding information
- Direct link to official website: https://www.abc.nc.gov/
- Alternative actions the user can take:
  * Rephrasing the question
  * Visiting the official website
  * Contacting support
  * Checking FAQ section
- Encouraging closing question to continue engagement

**Tone:** Professional, empathetic, helpful, and solution-oriented

**Format:** Structured text with bullet points, clear sections, and prominent website link placement

**Purpose:** Ensures users leave with actionable next steps even when automated search fails
